story_hero_title: A magical story world told by an AI friend! (AI Storybook)
story_hero_subtitle: Create wonderful stories in a world of imagination with Friender AI Storybook. You can become the protagonist, create stories, and complete cute picture books!
story_feature1_title: My own story that unleashes imagination
story_feature1_desc: Tell AI your fun ideas, like "flying dolphins" or "cookie-making dinosaurs." Your AI friend will turn your ideas into wonderful stories!
story_feature2_title: A special story told by an AI friend
story_feature2_desc: Shall we listen to the strange and fun stories created by AI? You can even record your own voice and become the protagonist in the fairy tale.
story_feature3_title: Completed as a wonderful picture book!
story_feature3_desc: AI will instantly draw pictures that perfectly match the story I created. Create and cherish your one-of-a-kind picture book!
story_for_parents_feature1_desc: AI Storybook helps children imagine freely and express stories in their own language. In this process, children's creativity and language expression naturally develop.
story_for_parents_feature2_title: An enjoyable experience of becoming familiar with books
story_for_parents_feature2_desc: Through the special experience of becoming a story writer themselves, children gain interest and confidence in reading and writing. This forms a strong foundation for literacy development.
story_cta_title: Are you ready to create your own wonderful story?
story_cta_desc: Just a few taps, and your one-of-a-kind AI picture book will appear with a 'ta-da!'
